title: Fantastic wedding destination is launched at Iniala Beach House - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Fantastic wedding destination is launched at Iniala Beach House Published on : Tuesday, October 13, 2015
Continually innovating, the team at Iniala Beach House have now unveiled a new space dedicated for weddings and events. Located in the Iniala grounds sits the recently launched ‘Iniala White’. A beautifully natural space created to host events requiring both an innovative and incomparable location.
Offering such a versatile space and relaxed atmosphere, Iniala White is the ideal destination for an intimate wedding or a large reception of up to 350 guests. With its manicured lawns suitable for banquet tables, scatter bean bags, bar areas and even a raised stage, guests can create their very own setting that is personable and distinctive to them individually.
Both interior and exterior seating arrangements may be tailor made to suit the needs and wants of the couple, working together with Iniala White’s dedicated team to create the same vision and exceed all expectations resulting in a memorable day for all.
The ‘White House’ offers a clubhouse with bridal suite, indoor dining and lounge area with ample space, perfect for the bride and wedding party to prepare and relax for their special day. An outdoor covered terrace that looks out over the shores of Natai Be
Iniala’s Head Chef Sandro Aguilera and the award-winning Sommelier Fabien Etienne are on hand to share their expertise, listening to each couple and customising signature dishes and ingredients comprising seafood, barbecued meats, select cuts and tasty imported cheeses. Bar and cooking stations are strategically placed to ensure waiters can tend to guests needs with ease and convenience, making sure the day flows smoothly. Couples may also choose cuisine from the acclaimed Aziamendi restaurant, headed by Michelin awarded Spanish Chef Eneko Atxa if they desire.
In addition to the wedding venue of Iniala White, guests can relish in the opportunity to continue their honeymoon at Iniala Beach House. The highly exclusive residence offers just ten suites that are positioned over three stunning beachfront villas and one spectacular penthouse, all of which boast breathtakingly gorgeous views of the sunset and ocean. A plethora of activities including private boat cruises, scuba diving, rural cycle tours and stand up paddle boarding are available for the more active. A diverse spa menu includes authentic Thai therapies and pampering rituals ideal for couples to unwind and connect with each other.
Children are welcomed and will be entertained and supervised in the resident kids only hotel. This one of a kind, dedicated hotel offers accommodation and a multitude of engaging activities including a theatre, climbing walls and a child friendly movie library. Trained nannies are available 24 hours a day to ensure parents can relax and enjoy their time together.
This truly amazing venue is not only available just for weddings but can also accommodate small concerts, corporate meetings, beachside lunches and destination dining.
Daily booking of Iniala White starts from:
High season – $4,000.00 USD Low season – $3,000.00 USD
